K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-3: tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-5: skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-6: 'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-7: lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-8: ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun tu yul zhig ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-024:313b-9: tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so //
